languages.text: "Я видел и более мерзкие деяния от обычных людей. Гадко знать, что в подлости и богохульстве человек превосходит генетических отродий".
languages.translation_comment:
Cleared the voidship crypt of genetic abominations.
Abelard: "An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It's simply inconceivable!"

languages.text: "I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."
languages.translation_comment:
Cleared the voidship crypt of genetic abominations.
Abelard: "An entire cult of mutant spawn, hiding among the dynasty's most eminent dead... It's simply inconceivable!"
languages.original_text: "Я видел и более мерзкие деяния от обычных людей. Гадко знать, что в подлости и богохульстве человек превосходит генетических отродий".

traits.locale_text: "I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans outrival genetic abominations."
"I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans outrival genetic abominations."
"I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."
"I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."
"I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."
"I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."

languages.text: 「普通の人間がより卑劣な行いに手を染めるのをこの目で見てきた。裏切りにせよ冒涜にせよ、人間という種は時に遺伝的忌まわしき者を凌駕してしまうものなのかと思うと、吐き気すら覚える」
languages.original_text: "I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."

traits.locale_text: 「普通の人間がより卑劣な行いに手を染めるのをこの目で見てきた。裏切りにせよ冒涜にせよ、人間という種は時に遺伝的忌まわしき者を凌駕してしまうものなのかと思うと、吐き気すら覚える」

languages.text: "Ich habe gewöhnliche Personen schon schlimmere Taten verüben sehen. Die Erkenntnis widert mich an, dass Menschen in Sachen Hinterlist und Sakrileg oftmals genetische Abscheulichkeiten übertreffen."
languages.original_text: "I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gewöhnliche Personen schon schlimmere Taten verüben sehen. Die Erkenntnis widert mich an, dass Menschen in Sachen Hinterlist und Sakrileg oftmals genetische Abscheulichkeiten übertreffen."

languages.text: «He visto a gente corriente cometer actos peores. Me da asco pensar que en lo que a traición y sacrilegio respecta, los humanos superamos con creces a las abominaciones genéticas».
languages.original_text: "I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."

traits.locale_text: «He visto a gente corriente cometer actos peores. Me da asco pensar que en lo que a traición y sacrilegio respecta, los humanos superamos con creces a las abominaciones genéticas».

languages.text: “我曾亲眼见过普通人做出更加恶劣的事情。我意识到，每当涉及到背叛和亵渎时，人类犯下的恶行，往往比那些基因怪物犯下的恶行更加卑劣，这让我无比厌恶。”
languages.original_text: "I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."

traits.locale_text: “我曾亲眼见过普通人做出更加恶劣的事情。我意识到，每当涉及到背叛和亵渎时，人类犯下的恶行，往往比那些基因怪物犯下的恶行更加卑劣，这让我无比厌恶。”

languages.text: "Avam insanlarının çok daha beter işlerine tanık oldum. İhanet ve kutsala hürmetsizlik söz konusu olduğunda genetik sapkınlıkları bile geride bırakabiliyor olmaları beni tiksindiriyor."
languages.original_text: "I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."

traits.locale_text: "Avam insanlarının çok daha beter işlerine tanık oldum. İhanet ve kutsala hürmetsizlik söz konusu olduğunda genetik sapkınlıkları bile geride bırakabiliyor olmaları beni tiksindiriyor."

languages.original_text: "I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."

languages.text: « J'ai vu des gens ordinaires commettre des actes bien pires. Il me répugne de reconnaître qu'en matière de trahison et de sacrilège, les humains surpassent souvent les abominations génétiques. »
languages.original_text: "I've witnessed ordinary people commit worse deeds. It disgusts me to realise that when it comes to treachery and sacrilege, humans often surpass genetic abominations."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu des gens ordinaires commettre des actes bien pires. Il me répugne de reconnaître qu'en matière de trahison et de sacrilège, les humains surpassent souvent les abominations génétiques. »
